block.signalcore.strong_detecting_displa:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-15
If strongly powered, the number will be red
block.signalcore.strong_detecting_hex_di:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-F
If strongly powered, the number will be red
block.signalcore.strong_display_block.to:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-15
Only when strongly powered
block.signalcore.strong_hex_display_bloc:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-F
Only when strongly powered
block.signalcore.color_display_block.too:
Displays the received redstone signal in wool color
0→Black, 1→White, 15→Red
block.signalcore.display_tile.tooltip:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-15,
of the block behind it
block.signalcore.hex_display_tile.toolti:
Displays the received redstone signal, 0-F,
of the block behind it
block.signalcore.binary_display_tile.too: Displays if the block behind received a redstone signal, 0-1
block.signalcore.signal_block.tooltip:
Emits a redstone signal
Right Click → Cycle
w/ Shift → Reverse Cycle
block.signalcore.strong_signal_block.too:
Strongly emits a redstone signal
Right Click → Cycle
w/ Shift → Reverse Cycle
Strongly emits a redstone signal to adjacent comparators
Right Click → Cycle
w/ Shift (no item) → Reverse Cycle
block.signalcore.directional_signal_bloc:
Emits a redstone signal in one direction
Right Click → Cycle
w/ Shift → Reverse Cycle
block.signalcore.strong_directional_sign:
Strongly Emits a redstone signal in one direction
Right Click → Cycle
w/ Shift → Reverse Cycle
